title: Shalini Chandran
text: Shalini Chandran is an Indian actress known for her role of Maithili in "<a href="Kahaani%20Ghar%20Ghar%20Kii">Kahaani Ghar Ghar Kii</a>". She also appeared as Tanya in "<a href="Hamari%20Betiyoon%20Ka%20Vivaah">Hamari Betiyoon Ka Vivaah</a>" and has performed on "<a href="Kabhi%20Kabhii%20Pyaar%20Kabhi%20Kabhii%20Yaar">Kabhi Kabhii Pyaar Kabhi Kabhii Yaar</a>".
